meanings.definition: To gamble more successfully or skillfully than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always manages to outgamble her friends during game night.
meanings.sent2: He outgambled his opponents by using clever strategies.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to outgamble the mouse in their playful chase around the house.
meanings.sent4: The young entrepreneur outgambled the competition by offering unique products.
meanings.sent5: Outgambling requires a mix of luck and strategy to come out on top.

meanings.sent1: The experienced gambler knows how to outgamble others at the poker table.
meanings.sent2: She outgambled her friends by winning the jackpot at the casino.
meanings.sent3: The magician seemed to outgamble the audience with his card tricks.
meanings.sent4: His risky move to outgamble the dealer paid off with a huge win.
meanings.sent5: Outgambling can be thrilling but also risky if not done wisely.
